resources.string: \tWelcome to Udacious Quiz App! This app currently only covered some of quizs from Basic Android courses. You could use it as an offline review app at any time! Thank you for your use!
Please type your name to enter quiz! Thanks!
1. What is the name of this XML element?
2. List all the property names(NOT the values) in order, use comma to split.
3. On what line number is the tag closed?
Quiz three: Choose the wrong item(s) which declear object in a wrong way
Quiz four: Code analysis - What is the result of the code above?
